thread.title: You Can Buy the Best of ’90s-Era Tommy Hilfiger
thread.title_full: You Can Buy the Best of ’90s-Era Tommy Hilfiger -- The Cut

author: Diana Tsui
title: You Can Buy the Best of ’90s-Era Tommy Hilfiger
text:
Photo: Zackery Michael
In case the Backstreet Boys making a comeback earlier this week at the Balmain x H&M event wasn't enough nineties-era nostalgia for you, there's another throwback happening. E-commerce site Mytheresa.com decided to partner up with Tommy Hilfiger on a capsule collection inspired by the designer's greatest hits from that time period. Modeled by Suki and Immy Waterhouse, the collection consists of nine logo-heavy pieces reinterpreted in luxe fabrics. This means they definitely cost more than the cotton tee you wore circa 1995 — the price ranges from $198 for the crop top to $654 for a bomber. But should your goals include looking like this Aaliyah commercial for the brand, here's your big chance to blast " Are You That Somebody " while dancing around in a branded bandeau. Good luck on finding those matching jeans, though.
Read ahead to see all the pieces.
